attributes.action: Don't axe Birmingham-Manchester line of HS2
attributes.additional_details: We believe that doing so would mean HS2 is a waste of money and countryside being ripped up in the Chilterns is being done in vain.
attributes.background: We want to make sure that the government doesn't scrap the Birmingham-Manchester leg of HS2.
